keyword: calories in a mcchicken no mayo
title: Calories in a McChicken No Mayo
meta_description: Discover calories in a McChicken no mayo, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, carbs, fat, sodium, and easy tweaks for your order.
h1: Calories in a McChicken No Mayo
assumptions: Standard McDonald's McChicken sandwich (breaded chicken patty, bun, lettuce) without mayonnaise; values based on official or averaged fast-food data.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, portion size, and preparation; always check McDonald's app or packaging for latest info.

quick_answer.text: A McChicken no mayo has about 350 kcal, with 14 g protein and 40 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with fast-food menus.

faqs.q: How many calories in a McChicken no mayo?
What's the protein in a McChicken without mayo?
faqs.a: About 14 g of protein from the chicken patty.

faqs.q: Does a McChicken no mayo have low carbs?
faqs.a: No, it has around 40 g carbs mainly from the bun.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a McChicken no mayo?
faqs.a: Roughly 700 mg, mostly from seasoning and breading.

faqs.q: What's the difference in calories with mayo?
faqs.a: Adding mayo increases it by about 45 kcal to 395 total.
